alert.note: Alert for Adams; Cumberland; Dauphin; Lancaster; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 10:38PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF LANCASTER...YORK... ADAMS...CUMBERLAND...AND DAUPHIN COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. This band of heavy snow is producing very heavy snow at the rate of around 1 inch per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1031 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was covering a wide portion of Adams and York counties. The band will pivot slightly through 1130 PM EST, and possibly expand to the east into Lancaster and southern Dauphin counties. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... York, Hanover, Elizabethtown, Columbia, Mechanicsburg, Harrisburg, Middletown, Camp Hill, Gettysburg, and Red Lion. * This includes the following Interstates... The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 233 to 259. Interstate 83 from mile markers 0 to 47. Interstate 283 from mile markers 0 to 2. SAFETY INFO... The snow will accumulate so rapidly that it will be extremely difficult for the road crews to keep the roads clear. If you must travel, slow down. If you can, delay travel until late tonight when the heavier snow moves to the east of the area. &&
